name: get_web_detection
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool web_detection.
Tool description: Extract list of entities, full matches urls, partial matches urls, visual matches urls, pages, locale and dimensions from image using (google vision web detection)
API description: the **important** thing is that you should use **image** as a query name
Example (url?**image**=“image_url”)

image.description: The URL of the image to be analyzed.
